name: Punctuating Mercury
description:
Overview

Punctuating Mercury is developed by a small team of gamedesign students, with the purpose of being a educational sideproject and portfolio piece. The game takes the classic nonogram puzzle "Hanjie" and lets the user solve its simple logic problems in a low-poly 3D environment. The goal of the game is to build houses in the correct tiles. The symbols on the side represent a number of connected houses.

How-to-play
  • left click: build/remove house
  • right click: mark as empty
  • right click and drag to move the camera
  • mouse wheel to zoom in/out
